${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ButterflyFlurry.NAME: Butterfly Flurry
${modID}:ButterflyFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!. NL If kill, gain !M! temporary strength and won't be exhaust.

${modID}:CaressingMoonlight.NAME: Caressing Moonlight
${modID}:CaressingMoonlight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger all ${modID}:Dot of the target.

${modID}:ChampagneEtiquette.NAME: Champagne Etiquette
${modID}:ChampagneEtiquette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !B! block. NL Your next attack cost 0.

${modID}:DecadenceFalseTwilight.NAME: Decadence, False Twilight
${modID}:DecadenceFalseTwilight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply vulnerable and increase dot damage by 50% for !duration! turns. NL Apply !M! wind dot .

${modID}:FlorephemeralDreamflux.NAME: Florephemeral Dreamflux
${modID}:FlorephemeralDreamflux.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!. NL Randomly exhaust 2 cards.

${modID}:GalvnicChords.NAME: Galvnic Chords
${modID}:GalvnicChords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is inflicted with ${modID}:Dot, draw 1 card and gain 1 energy.

${modID}:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
${modID}:Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Randomly remove one of Strength, Artifact, PlatedArmor, Thorns of the target.

${modID}:HighPoles.NAME: High Poles
${modID}:HighPoles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cause fire ${modID}:Dot damage !M! duration !duration!.

${modID}:ItsMagicIaddSomeMagic.NAME: It's Magic, I Add SomeMagic
${modID}:ItsMagicIaddSomeMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Deal !M! ${modID}:Follow-Up damage when any enemy's health is under 50% by this damage.

${modID}:MeteorStorm.NAME: Meteor Storm
${modID}:MeteorStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemies !M! times. NL Gain 1 strength by the number of enemies hit for 1 turn. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!

${modID}:PranaExtirpated.NAME: Prana Extirpated
${modID}:PranaExtirpated.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Lightning-Lord increase by 2.

${modID}:ShapeOfTaixuDawnHerald.NAME: Shape Of Taixu: Dawn Herald
${modID}:ShapeOfTaixuDawnHerald.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is in ${modID}:Weakness_Break, draw 1 card and gain 1 energy.

${modID}:SlashedDreamCriesInRed.NAME: Slashed Dream Cries In Red
${modID}:SlashedDreamCriesInRed.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You can't play this card until you have 9 ${modID}:Slashed_Dreams. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:StardustAce.NAME: Stardust Ace
${modID}:StardustAce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D1! damage to one or deal !D2! to all.

${modID}:RIPHomeRun.NAME: RIP Home Run
${modID}:RIPHomeRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction! .

${modID}:TwilightTrill.NAME: Twilight Trill
${modID}:TwilightTrill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Cause lightning ${modID}:Dot damage !M! duration !duration!.

${modID}:ZoneSuppression.NAME: Zone Suppression
${modID}:ZoneSuppression.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! vulnerable.

${modID}:AllOutFootlightParade.NAME: All-Out Footlight Parade
${modID}:AllOutFootlightParade.DESCRIPTION: When attack enemy targets that are in the ${modID}:Weakness_Broken state, the Toughness Reduction of this attack will be converted into 1 instance of Super Break DMG.

${modID}:AwaitingSystemResponse.NAME: Awaiting System Response...
${modID}:AwaitingSystemResponse.DESCRIPTION: When attack, apply a random DEBUFF in weak/vulnerable/-2 strength this turn to enemy.

${modID}:BleakBreedsBliss.NAME: Bleak Breeds Bliss
${modID}:BleakBreedsBliss.DESCRIPTION: When health is under half, heal the amount of unblocked damage when attacked.

${modID}:Dreamdiver.NAME: Dreamdiver
${modID}:Dreamdiver.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn after you draw cards, pick up a card in your discard pile and put it on the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:FangOfFlareFlaying.NAME: Fang Of Flare Flaying
${modID}:FangOfFlareFlaying.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! ${modID}:Follow-Up damage when hit enemies 8 times.

${modID}:KarmicPerpetuation.NAME: Karmic Perpetuation
${modID}:KarmicPerpetuation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards every time you deplete 8 point of toughness.

${modID}:KnownByStarsShownByHearts.NAME: Known By Stars Shown By Hearts
${modID}:KnownByStarsShownByHearts.DESCRIPTION: Reduce damage to 5 when damage is more than 5.

${modID}:QuidProQuo.NAME: Quid Pro Quo
${modID}:QuidProQuo.DESCRIPTION: When your energy is less than 50%, each time you play non-zero cost card, draw !M! card.

${modID}:StringSingsSlowSwirls.NAME: String Sings Slow Swirls
${modID}:StringSingsSlowSwirls.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50%.

${modID}:VictoryRush.NAME: Victory Rush
${modID}:VictoryRush.DESCRIPTION: When an enemy is inflicted with ${modID}:Weakness_Break, deal !M! ${modID}:Follow-Up damage to all enemies and ${modID}:Toughness_Reduction !reduction!.

${modID}:AmidstTheRejoicingClouds.NAME: Amidst The Rejoicing Clouds
${modID}:AmidstTheRejoicingClouds.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Choose a card in hand, it cost 0 this turn and its damage increase by !M! this battle.

${modID}:CherryOnTop.NAME: Cherry On Top
${modID}:CherryOnTop.DESCRIPTION: Randomly choose X times: deal !D! damage/ draw 2 cards / gain 2 energy and randomly discard 1
${modID}:CherryOnTop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly choose X+1 times: deal !D! damage/ draw 2 cards / gain 2 energy and randomly discard 1

${modID}:CombatRedeployment.NAME: Combat Redeployment
${modID}:CombatRedeployment.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Choose a card in draw pile/ discard pile and add it to your hand. it cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:DanceDanceDance.NAME: Dance Dance Dance
${modID}:DanceDanceDance.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Choose 4 cards in your discard pile and put them at the top of draw pile.
${modID}:DanceDanceDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 4 cards in your discard pile and put them at the top of draw pile.

${modID}:DifficultyPaying.NAME: Difficulty Paying
${modID}:DifficultyPaying.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL The target get 50% more ${modID}:Follow-Up damage. Every 3 times you attack the enemy, draw a card.

${modID}:EverBurningAmber.NAME: Ever Burning Amber
${modID}:EverBurningAmber.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! weak to all enemies.

${modID}:FiendImpeachmentOfEvil.NAME: Fiend Impeachment Of Evil
${modID}:FiendImpeachmentOfEvil.DESCRIPTION: Enemies get Weak and loss 2 strength this turn.

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Complete Combustion
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust Retain NL Randomly add 4 ${modID}:SAM cards to your deck. You can choose one of them to add to your hand immediately.
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVCompleteCombustion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust Retain NL Randomly add 4 upgraded ${modID}:SAM cards to your deck. You can choose one of them to add to your hand immediately.

${modID}:ChrysalidPyronexus.NAME: Chrysalid Pyronexus
${modID}:ChrysalidPyronexus.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , gain !B! block and deal ${modID}:Super_Break.

${modID}:DeltaOrderMeteoricIncineration.NAME: Î” Order: Meteoric Incineration
${modID}:DeltaOrderMeteoricIncineration.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , cause fire ${modID}:Dot damage !M! duration !duration! and deal ${modID}:Super_Break.

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVDeathstarOverload.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Deathstar Overload
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVDeathstarOverload.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Exhaust . Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw 1 card, heal !M! and deal ${modID}:Super_Break.

${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVPyrogenicDecimatio.NAME: Fyrefly Type-IV: Pyrogenic Decimation
${modID}:FyreflyTypeIVPyrogenicDecimatio.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , deal ${modID}:Super_Break .

${modID}:OrderAerialBombardment.NAME: Order: Aerial Bombardment
${modID}:OrderAerialBombardment.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , gain !M! energy and deal ${modID}:Super_Break.

${modID}:OrderFlarePropulsion.NAME: Order: Flare Propulsion
${modID}:OrderFlarePropulsion.DESCRIPTION: Retain . Deal !D! damage NL ${modID}:Reduction !reduction! NL If target in ${modID}:Weakness_Broken , draw !M! cards and deal ${modID}:Super_Break.

${modID}:LoveHealAndChoose.NAME: Love, Heal And Choose
${modID}:LoveHealAndChoose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and randomly exhaust !M! CURSE or STATUS cards in your draw pile and discard pile.

${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.NAME: Petals To Stream, Repose In Dream
${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Extend the duration of enemies' ${modID}:Weakness_Broken for one turn.
${modID}:PetalsToStreamReposeInDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Extend the duration of enemies' ${modID}:Weakness_Broken for one turn.

${modID}:SamsaraLocked.NAME: Samsara Locked
${modID}:SamsaraLocked.DESCRIPTION: Apply burden to enemy for !M! turns, every 2 times you hit the enemy, gain 1 energy.

${modID}:SnowfieldFirstAid.NAME: Snowfield First Aid
${modID}:SnowfieldFirstAid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and keep block for !M! turns. Remove all the DEBUFF.

${modID}:TailSpiritualDomination.NAME: Tail Spiritual Domination
${modID}:TailSpiritualDomination.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Gain 1 energy and 2 strength.

${modID}:TailsmanProtection.NAME: Tailsman Protection
${modID}:TailsmanProtection.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! and when you play a card, heal !M!.

${modID}:TheHeroWithAThousandFaces.NAME: The Hero With A Thousand Faces
${modID}:TheHeroWithAThousandFaces.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy and discard 1 non-attack card when drawn NL Draw !M! cards when move into discard pile.

${modID}:ThePowerOfCuteness.NAME: The Power Of Cuteness
${modID}:ThePowerOfCuteness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and ${modID}:counter !D! when you have block.

${modID}:TheShield.NAME: The Shield
${modID}:TheShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. When your block is broken, enemies gain !M! block.

${modID}:VoxHarmoniqueOpusCosmique.NAME: Vox Harmonique Opus Cosmique
${modID}:VoxHarmoniqueOpusCosmique.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Choose 3 cards in your draw pile, decrease their costs by 1 and put them in the top of the draw pile.
